name: Tanks of war
description:
Treadnauts breathes a breath of fresh air into the competitive fighting game genre with its smooth physics. Gracefully pilot your tank through beautiful arenas to land a deadly shot on your opponents! You have an arsenal of tricks at your disposal, including tracks that stick to any wall, boosters to perform mid-air jumps, frictionless skids, and rocket jumps to lift you into the sky. It's all about moving with style!

Four playable zones, each with unique mechanics and physical properties

An explosive, competitive local mode for 2-4 gunners

Online multiplayer mode for solo pilots or duos (Beta!)

Artificial intelligence tanks with three difficulty levels

Timed target practice mode with medals and world ranking

Laser guns, grappling hooks, homing shells, and lots of other upgrades to pick up

Dynamic soundtrack by King Felix that changes every time you play

Player progression with levels to earn and cards and characters to unlock

Modifiers to shake things up a bit: weightlessness, bouncing balls, jet packs and more!
